name: TSG Global
tag_list: voip, sms, text-messaging, did, toll-free, canadian, e911, lrn
overview:
TSG Global plays a key role in the merging and adoption of VoIP and text messaging applications. TSG enables service providers and enterprises the ability to enhance the consumer interaction experience by breaking down the barrier between wired services and the coveted mobile channel. The company has extensive experience in providing complete engineering, consulting, and professional services to clients in the Telecom and Enterprise sectors. Now what dictates TSG Global standing apart is its dedication and innovative services in text messaging and VoIP verticals.

TSG Global, Inc. is a privately held Facilities Based and Regulatory Compliant VoIP and SMS Texting service provider. The company’s value is a direct result of meeting the telecom challenges confronted by Enterprise and Wholesale Clients alike. TSG’s Enterprise Solutions, include a customized “Self-Service” VoIP and Texting Model created to replace traditional wire-line innovation which empowers global customer’s with the ability to accelerate their corporate growth by furnishing them with the products and tools needed to maintain or develop new and exciting applications. TSG’s Wholesale offerings are supplied via a fully geographic redundant network designed and to support the entire IP suite of products: SMS Text Messaging, Long Code, Measured or Flat Rate DID, Canadian DID, International DID, Toll-Free, Termination, CNAM, LRN and e911 services.
